metadataAttributes.Title: Applied Data Science with R Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Build Your Data Science Skills with R & SQL. Master the ability to transform data into information and insights.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Shiny Dashboards, Data Analysis and Modelling, R Programmin Language, Data Visualization (DataViz), SQL & RDBMS, Data Science, R Programming, Select (Sql), Relational Databases (RDBMS), Data Analysis, Statistical Analysis, Linear Regression,
